page.title: 04Dairy Farming
page.content: My uncle called Jim works on a farm called Home Farm. It has 14 fields and altogether they make 170 acres. Most of these fields get bales. This year they made 5000 hay bales, which is approximately 2000 hay bales down from other years. On this farm they have 6 tractors which help them bale, mow, and turn the grass.They also use them to get the cows in.They have 149 cows, 74 of them get milked.These cows make 1300 litres of milk which gets picked up once a day by Express Dairy. Thirty-one cows are ready to have calves and 24 are young heifers and twelve are calves. They do not keep bulls. Rachel Ryan
